cot.content:
To solve the problem, Please think and reason step by step, then answer.
question:
who plays emma in air bud world pup
        
Generation Format:
Reasoning process:
Answer:

Reasoning process: To answer the question, I need to identify the actress who portrayed the character Emma in the movie "Air Bud: World Pup." This film is part of the "Air Bud" franchise, which features a dog that plays various sports. I will recall or look up the cast of the movie to find the actress associated with the character Emma.

Answer: Emma is played by actress Caitlin Wachs in "Air Bud: World Pup."

anchoring.content:
You are a cognitive scientist, to answer the following question:
who plays emma in air bud world pup
I will provide you with several retrieved passages:
Passages:
['Air Bud: World Pup\n', 'BULLET::::- "Air Bud: World Pup" at Allmovie\n', "The series follows the adventures of Finn (voiced by Jeremy Shada), a human boy, and his best friend and adoptive brother Jake (voiced by John DiMaggio), a dog with magical powers to change shape and grow and shrink at will. In this episode, Marceline enlists Princess Bubblegum's help in order to track Maja the Sky Witch (voiced by Talley); it is revealed that Marceline's ex-boyfriend Ash sold Marceline's beloved stuffed animal Hambo to Maja. Only when Bubblegum trades her prized rock shirt—which was given to her by Marceline—is Hambo able to be reunited with Marceline.\n", 'Marceline arrives at the Candy Kingdom and beseeches Bubblegum to help her track down Maja, the Sky Witch (voiced by Jill Talley), arguing that it will allow the two to spend "quality time" with one another. Bubblegum eventually agrees, and the two journey to Maja\'s trap-infested lair. Bubblegum soon learns that Marceline is hoping to retrieve her beloved teddy bear, Hambo, that her ex-boyfriend Ash had previously traded for a magic wand. Bubblegum is annoyed that Marceline is worrying about a mere teddy bear, but Marceline, thinking that she sees Hambo, takes off, deeper into the lair.\n', 'BULLET::::- Deema ("The Drama Queen") (voiced by Angelina Wahler, Selena Gonzalez (singing for Season 1) and Grace Kaufman in US, and Harriet Perring in series 1-2 and Amba Bierer in series 3-4 in UK) is a guppy girl with a zany personality, and a sweet side. She has light skin, orange/yellow curly hair, blue eyes, orange earrings, which she did wear in "Temple of the Lost Puppy," and an orange/yellow spotted bikini top and tail. Deema has a wild imagination and often plays the role of shopkeeper in the "store" segments.\n']

question_info.question: who plays emma in air bud world pup
passages:
Air Bud: World Pup
BULLET::::- "Air Bud: World Pup" at Allmovie
The series follows the adventures of Finn (voiced by Jeremy Shada), a human boy, and his best friend and adoptive brother Jake (voiced by John DiMaggio), a dog with magical powers to change shape and grow and shrink at will. In this episode, Marceline enlists Princess Bubblegum's help in order to track Maja the Sky Witch (voiced by Talley); it is revealed that Marceline's ex-boyfriend Ash sold Marceline's beloved stuffed animal Hambo to Maja. Only when Bubblegum trades her prized rock shirt—which was given to her by Marceline—is Hambo able to be reunited with Marceline.
Marceline arrives at the Candy Kingdom and beseeches Bubblegum to help her track down Maja, the Sky Witch (voiced by Jill Talley), arguing that it will allow the two to spend "quality time" with one another. Bubblegum eventually agrees, and the two journey to Maja's trap-infested lair. Bubblegum soon learns that Marceline is hoping to retrieve her beloved teddy bear, Hambo, that her ex-boyfriend Ash had previously traded for a magic wand. Bubblegum is annoyed that Marceline is worrying about a mere teddy bear, but Marceline, thinking that she sees Hambo, takes off, deeper into the lair.
BULLET::::- Deema ("The Drama Queen") (voiced by Angelina Wahler, Selena Gonzalez (singing for Season 1) and Grace Kaufman in US, and Harriet Perring in series 1-2 and Amba Bierer in series 3-4 in UK) is a guppy girl with a zany personality, and a sweet side. She has light skin, orange/yellow curly hair, blue eyes, orange earrings, which she did wear in "Temple of the Lost Puppy," and an orange/yellow spotted bikini top and tail. Deema has a wild imagination and often plays the role of shopkeeper in the "store" segments.
